item.description:
On June 10 at 6:00 pm, Jonathan Taylor Assoc. AIA, LEED AP of Goody Clancy discusses "The Intern Development Program (IDP) and the Path to Licensure" at The Architects Building. Since becoming the Massachusetts IDP coordinator in 2002, Taylor has helped countless students and young designers navigate through their education and internships.

All are welcome at this free event. To ensure ample pizza, RVSP to 617-951-1433 x221 or bsa@architects.org by 9:30 am on the morning of the event.
item.why: Learn how to navigate through the IDP, meet other young professionals and enjoy some free pizza while you're at it!
item.name: IDP and the Path to Licensure
